course_description: The course is a comprehensive review of anesthesia concepts and considerations. The depth and breadth of scientific principles found in Nurse Anesthesia Application I-IV is solidified with an emphasis on professional practice.
prerequisites: NRSG 690 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1485, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 8-10:50a, Instructor: K. Cole, Status: Open
